Posts.Content: Jun 24, 2008 12:56AM smirasky wrote: My last chemo was July 4th 07.  I had enough hair to go without anything by October.  My hair came in with curl!!!  I was thrilled after a lifetime with straight hair.  But now it is almost back to its original straightness.  It's just good to have hair.  I was back to coloring it by November.  Just couldn't stand the salt & pepper effect.
Posts.Title: Hair Hair Hair - Another question Deen Krose53
